title: 287: Katie’s Bachelorette FINALE & After The Final Rose!
itunes:title: 287: Katie’s Bachelorette FINALE & After The Final Rose!
description:
The season has officially ended, Broads, and you KNOW The Broads are happy with this engagement! Bekah and Jess do a lot of catching up about Greg, feel sad about not seeing more of Justin after his AFR appearance, speculate about the future Bachelor pick, process through Katie and Greg’s sit down on AFR, and then walk through the love story of Blake and Katie, obviously gloat a little about it, and much more!

 

GET TICKETS TO THE LIVE ONLINE “ALMOST PARADISE" SHOW HERE: https://app.loopedlive.com/c/3679
